short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspiring tennis quotes, fun facts, and beautiful tennis backgrounds on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Challenge your tennis knowledge and stay inspired with the Tennis Quiz Master & Motivation extension! Perfect for fans and players, this extension brings you random motivational quotes from legends like Serena Williams and Roger Federer, along with fascinating trivia, little-known facts, and quiz questions to test your tennis IQ. Discover “On This Day in Tennis History” to relive iconic matches and records, and enjoy beautiful tennis-themed backgrounds with each new tab. Whether you're brushing up on your tennis trivia or just looking for a boost, Tennis Quiz Master & Motivation keeps the game alive on every page.
